course_name: 'E' Technologies for the Food & Fibre Sector
description:
OFFERED EVEN YEARS ONLY. An in-depth study of the major technology issues facing the food and fibre sector throughout the supply chain from on-farm to the consumer when moving into the electronic business environment- including food traceability technologies, mobile phone app development and use in the agrifood sector, and legal issues. Current agri-industry examples are used throughout.
Course Materials available online via Blackboard site.
*Practicals may be replaced with online tutorials.
